name: Spiked Path (Demo)
description: This is my first ever game. Spiked Path is a simple 2d platformer in which you avoid spikes. This is a great game to speedrun as its a short demo. Controls: WASD/ARROW KEYS to move, R to restart level (counts as a death), Ctrl to go to the title screen. Controller: DPAD to move, A to jump. Y to restart level (counts as death) 'Menu' to go to title screen. If you collect all the hearts and NEVER die once, you might unlock a secret level. Game by NZia. This is only a demo.
